words.source: H935 conj. + Hiphil perf. 1cs of בּוֹא 'to come; Hiphil: to bring'; KJV 'I will bring', ESV 'I will bring', NASB 'I will bring'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; KJV 'in unto', ESV 'into', NASB 'to'
H776 def. art. + n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the land', ESV 'the land', NASB 'the land'
H834 rel. pron. ʾasher 'who, which, that'; KJV 'the which', ESV 'that', NASB 'which'
H5375 Qal perf. 1cs of נָשָׂא 'to lift, carry'; idiom 'to lift the hand' = to swear an oath; KJV 'I did swear', ESV 'I swore', NASB 'I swore'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H3027 n.fs yad 'hand' + 1cs suff.; part of oath idiom 'lift the hand'; KJV 'mine hand' (= swore), ESV absorbed into 'swore', NASB absorbed into 'swore'
H5414 prep. l- + Qal inf. cstr. of נָתַן 'to give'; KJV 'to give', ESV 'to give', NASB 'to give'
H853 DOM + 3fs suff. (referring to the land); KJV 'it', ESV 'it', NASB 'it'
H85 prep. l- + proper name; all trans. agree
H3327 prep. l- + proper name; all trans. agree
H3290 conj. + prep. l- + proper name; all trans. agree
H5414 conj. + Qal perf. 1cs of נָתַן 'to give'; KJV 'I will give', ESV 'I will give', NASB 'I will give'
H853 DOM + 3fs suff. (referring to the land); KJV 'it', ESV 'it', NASB 'it'
prep. l- + 2mp suff.; KJV 'you', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'
H4181 n.fs morashah 'possession, inheritance'; important land theology term denoting permanent ancestral possession; KJV 'for an heritage', ESV 'for a possession', NASB 'for a possession'
H589 pron. 1cs ʾani 'I'; KJV 'I am', ESV 'I am', NASB 'I am'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
